attributes.action: actively take the steps to create another bank holiday by the end of 2008 and award the hard working people of the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain has the least number of bank holidays in the UK- Britons currently enjoy eight bank holidays compared with 11 in France, 15 in Germany and 16 in Spain. Slovenia is top in Europe with 18 days. This will only benefit the health and well being of the nation. Please support my petition
